channel.title: Office 365 on ToastIT
channel.description: Recent content in Office 365 on ToastIT

item.title: My Learning Story: From Timber to Chocolatey
item.description: This post is part of #TheMVPChallenge. It’s not exactly what was on the brief… but I think it’s a story worth telling!

item.title: Getting Selective with Veeam Backup for Microsoft Office 365
item.description: I can’t stand “expected warnings,” but getting selective in my VBO jobs got me back to my happy place.

item.title: Veeam Backup for Microsoft Office 365 v3.0: It's Good, Very Good
item.description: I’ve been testing a beta of Veeam Backup for Microsoft Office 365 v3. It ticked some boxes of mine (spoiler alert.)

item.title: Everything Is Better with Toast: Getting Build Notifications
item.description: When you want to keep an eye on build results, but don’t want to dedicate a screen to the web page, toast is the answer!

item.title: My Wish List for Veeam Backup for Microsoft Office 365 v3
item.description: I heard a rumor that v3 is already well into development… hopeful it’s not too late to register my feature wish list!

item.title: Pre-Migration Housekeeping: Finding Orphaned Shared Mailboxes
item.description: Time for a bit of Exchange flavoured spring cleaning? Let’s find some un-needed shared mailboxes!

item.title: Copying Office 365 User Licensing
item.description: Spoiler alert: this post didn’t end up the way I expected it to when I started writing…

item.title: Office 365 & PowerShell: Connecting All the Pieces
item.description: Now that we’ve figured out how to connect to each of the Office 365 services, it’s time to tie a pretty (PowerShell) blue bow on it.

item.title: Office 365 & PowerShell: Jacking Into the Matrix
item.description: Just like their on-premises counterparts, each of these products has their own PowerShell interface for management.
